title: In these Regulations, a reference to a section is a reference to that section
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community 
Safety Act 2024 (Section 107) (Operation and Procedures of Steering Group) 
Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (section 107) (operation procedure steering group) regulation 2025

heading: 3. The following public service bodies are prescribed, for the purposes of

title: In these Regulations, a reference to a section is a reference to that section
heading: 4. A person shall not be appointed to the Steering Group pursuant to section
text_raw:
4. A person shall not be appointed to the Steering Group pursuant to section 
107(4)(b)(v) unless the Minister is satisfied that the person has sufficient 
experience and expertise in relation to the functions of local authorities and the 
manner in which local authorities operate, particularly insofar as those functions 
and that manner of operation relate to community safety.
text_norm: 4 person shall appointed steering group pursuant section 107(4)(b)(v) unless minister satisfied person sufficient experience expertise relation function local authority manner local authority operate particularly insofar function manner operation relate community safety

title: In these Regulations, a reference to a section is a reference to that section
heading: 5. (1) A member of the Steering Group shall hold office, unless the member
text_raw:
5. (1) A member of the Steering Group shall hold office, unless the member 
sooner dies, resigns, becomes disqualified or is removed from office, for such 
period, not exceeding 3 years from the date of his or her appointment pursuant 
to section 107(4), as the Minister shall determine. 

(2) A member of the Steering Group whose term of office expires by the 
effluxion of time shall be eligible for reappointment to the office concerned, 
pursuant to section 107(4), for a further period not exceeding 3 years. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [184] 3
text_norm: 5 (1) member steering group shall hold office unless member sooner dy resigns becomes disqualified removed office period exceeding 3 year date appointment pursuant section 107(4) minister shall determine (2) member steering group whose term office expires effluxion time shall eligible reappointment office concerned pursuant section 107(4) period exceeding 3 year notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 16th may 2025 184 3

title: In these Regulations, a reference to a section is a reference to that section
heading: 6. The Steering Group shall hold such and so many meetings as may be
text_raw:
6. The Steering Group shall hold such and so many meetings as may be 
necessary for the performance of its functions but in each year shall hold at least 
4 meetings.
text_norm: 6 steering group shall hold many meeting may necessary performance function year shall hold least 4 meeting

title: In these Regulations, a reference to a section is a reference to that section
heading: 7. At a meeting of the Steering Group –
text_raw:
7. At a meeting of the Steering Group – 

(a) 

the chairperson of the Steering Group shall, where present, chair 
the meeting, or 

(b) where and so long as the chairperson of the Steering Group is not 
present or where that office is vacant, the other members of the 
Steering Group who are present shall choose one of their number 
to chair the meeting.
text_norm: 7 meeting steering group - (a) chairperson steering group shall present chair meeting (b) long chairperson steering group present office vacant member steering group present shall choose one number chair meeting

title: In these Regulations, a reference to a section is a reference to that section
heading: 8. The quorum for a meeting of the Steering Group shall be 5.
text_raw:
8. The quorum for a meeting of the Steering Group shall be 5. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Minister for Justice, 

13 May, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [184]
